summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northeast, from East 39th Street to a point 20 feet, more or less, south of the south line of Lot 15, Block 12, Laurelhurst Heights Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12367 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
